value: 65 km from Salem by bus and train.
Hogenakkal Water Falls - famous tourist spot in Tamilnadu. Go to boating, eat fishes and have a oil massage and bath under the falls
Kottai Perumal Kovil (temple). It was built in 9th century.
Malligarjuneshwaraswamy (Lord Shiva) Temple and Perumal Temple. This may be the only place where Perumal is in sitting position with thaayar. This is 108 th in 108 vaishnava divya desams.
Kadagathur Siva Temple (7 km) from Dharmapuri
Waterfalls in Hogenakkal - nice oil bath, boating and try local fried fish (40 km)
Ancient Siva Temple in Teerthamalai (40 km) and many more ancient temples in and around the town.

There is a hill series in the east side of the city, which looks like a lady laying down when watched from a place called Nallampalli. The sunrise from behind this hill is the most beautiful moment in every morning.

Every one should try out the tasty and spicy Roadside

.

Town is famous for fruit Mango. You can get more than 50 variety of Mangoes in market. Taste it.

The food item called paniyaram is famous here
